languages.text: {n}Маражай придирчиво изучает свое снаряжение, но как только вы приближаетесь к нему, все его внимание обращается на вашу персону.{/n} "{name}! Вот и ты! Тебя ждет нечто очень особенное, не так ли? Испытание, которое определит, останешься ли ты на вершине — или станешь пылью под ногами твоих недругов".

{n}Marazhai is meticulously inspecting his gear, but turns his entire attention to your person when you approach.{/n} "{name}! There you are! You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай придирчиво изучает свое снаряжение, но как только вы приближаетесь к нему, все его внимание обращается на вашу персону.{/n} "{name}! Вот и ты! Тебя ждет нечто очень особенное, не так ли? Испытание, которое определит, останешься ли ты на вершине — или станешь пылью под ногами твоих недругов".

You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."

You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."

You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."

You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."

{n}Marazhai is meticulously inspecting his gear, but turns his entire attention to your person when you approach.{/n} "{name}! There you are! You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋一丝不苟地地检查着他的装备，但当你走近时，他所有的注意力都转向了你。{/n}“{name}！你在这儿啊！等待你的命运还真是不同寻常，你说呢？你究竟会踩在万人之上，还是会成为敌人脚下的尘土？这场试炼将决定一切。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is meticulously inspecting his gear, but turns his entire attention to your person when you approach.{/n} "{name}! There you are! You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋一丝不苟地地检查着他的装备，但当你走近时，他所有的注意力都转向了你。{/n}“{name}！你在这儿啊！等待你的命运还真是不同寻常，你说呢？你究竟会踩在万人之上，还是会成为敌人脚下的尘土？这场试炼将决定一切。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai inspecciona su equipamiento en detalle, pero redirige toda su atención hacia ti cuando te aproximas.{/n} «¡{name}! ¡Ahí estás! Te espera un momento muy especial, ¿no es así? Una prueba que determinará si te alzas sobre tus enemigos o si te conviertes en polvo bajo sus pies».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is meticulously inspecting his gear, but turns his entire attention to your person when you approach.{/n} "{name}! There you are! You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai inspecciona su equipamiento en detalle, pero redirige toda su atención hacia ti cuando te aproximas.{/n} «¡{name}! ¡Ahí estás! Te espera un momento muy especial, ¿no es así? Una prueba que determinará si te alzas sobre tus enemigos o si te conviertes en polvo bajo sus pies».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは装備を入念に点検していたが、あなたが近づくとこちらを振り返って注目してくる。{/n}「{name}！ここにいたのか！何か特別なことが待っているんだろう？お前が頂点に立ち続けるか、それとも敵の足元の塵と化すかを決める試練が」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is meticulously inspecting his gear, but turns his entire attention to your person when you approach.{/n} "{name}! There you are! You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは装備を入念に点検していたが、あなたが近づくとこちらを振り返って注目してくる。{/n}「{name}！ここにいたのか！何か特別なことが待っているんだろう？お前が頂点に立ち続けるか、それとも敵の足元の塵と化すかを決める試練が」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai inspiziert penibel seine Ausrüstung, schenkt dir jedoch seine gesamte Aufmerksamkeit, als du dich näherst.{/n} "{name}! Da seid Ihr ja! Auf Euch wartet etwas ganz Besonderes, nicht wahr? Eine Prüfung, die darüber entscheidet, ob Ihr obenauf bleibt oder zu Staub unter den Füßen Eurer Feinde werdet."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is meticulously inspecting his gear, but turns his entire attention to your person when you approach.{/n} "{name}! There you are! You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai inspiziert penibel seine Ausrüstung, schenkt dir jedoch seine gesamte Aufmerksamkeit, als du dich näherst.{/n} "{name}! Da seid Ihr ja! Auf Euch wartet etwas ganz Besonderes, nicht wahr? Eine Prüfung, die darüber entscheidet, ob Ihr obenauf bleibt oder zu Staub unter den Füßen Eurer Feinde werdet."

languages.text: {n}Occupé à inspecter méticuleusement son équipement, Marazhai tourne toute son attention vers vous dès qu'il vous aperçoit.{/n} « {name} ! Vous voilà ! L'instant de vérité approche à grands pas, n'est-ce pas ? Ce combat décidera de votre sort : la confirmation de votre supériorité ou la mort aux mains de vos ennemis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is meticulously inspecting his gear, but turns his entire attention to your person when you approach.{/n} "{name}! There you are! You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Occupé à inspecter méticuleusement son équipement, Marazhai tourne toute son attention vers vous dès qu'il vous aperçoit.{/n} « {name} ! Vous voilà ! L'instant de vérité approche à grands pas, n'est-ce pas ? Ce combat décidera de votre sort : la confirmation de votre supériorité ou la mort aux mains de vos ennemis. »

languages.text: {n}Özenle ekipmanını kontrol eden Marazhai, yaklaştığını görünce tüm dikkatini sana çeviriyor.{/n} "{name}! İşte buradasın! Seni çok özel bir şeyler bekliyor, haksız mıyım? Bu sınav, zirvede mi kalacaksın yoksa düşmanlarının ayağının altındaki toz mu olacaksın belli edecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is meticulously inspecting his gear, but turns his entire attention to your person when you approach.{/n} "{name}! There you are! You have something very special waiting for you, do you not? A trial that will determine whether you stay on top or become dust under the feet of your enemies."
